data.title: Paramjit Gill
data.text:
Job Title

Professor

Department

WMS - Health Sciences

Overview

Publications

Research Projects

Research Interests

Research interests include addressing health inequalities particularly amongst migrant populations and evidence-based health care and its application to health care delivery. His current focus is on communicable and non-communicable diseases. Paramjit is engaged in the full range of research methodologies from both the quantitative and qualitative paradigms. He is involved in a number of national and international studies.
